name: passei-aki
description: Registra páginas acessadas e indica quando um link já foi visitado

scripts.start: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='src';const dist='dist';fs.rmSync(dist,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dist,{recursive:true});['manifest.json','manifest.chrome.json','manifest.firefox.json'].forEach(f=>{try{fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dist,f));}catch(e){}});fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,'manifest.firefox.json'),path.join(dist,'manifest.json'));" && web-ext run --source-dir dist
scripts.build:chrome: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='src';const dist='dist';fs.rmSync(dist,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dist,{recursive:true});['manifest.json','manifest.chrome.json','manifest.firefox.json'].forEach(f=>{try{fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dist,f));}catch(e){}});fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,'manifest.chrome.json'),path.join(dist,'manifest.json'));" && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir dist --filename passei-aki-{version}_chrome.zip
scripts.build:firefox: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='src';const dist='dist';fs.rmSync(dist,{recursive:true,force:true});fs.cpSync(src,dist,{recursive:true});['manifest.json','manifest.chrome.json','manifest.firefox.json'].forEach(f=>{try{fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dist,f));}catch(e){}});fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,'manifest.firefox.json'),path.join(dist,'manifest.json'));" && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir dist --filename passei-aki-{version}_firefox.zip
